duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise the front of house staff, including Service, Bar, and Hosts.
Recruit, train, and develop staff dedicated to delivering high-level hospitality to guests.
Achieve targeted budgets, goals, and objectives.
Assist in community involvement programs and marketing runs.
Ensure the profitability of restaurant operations and manage operating expenses.
Ensure work safety and respond to guest concerns creatively.
Complete daily restaurant paperwork and conduct pre-shift meetings.
Review reservations, update the team on key business updates, and place orders for supplies.
Ensure standards of food safety, sanitation, and quality are maintained.
Attend and participate in weekly manager meetings.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED required; Bachelor’s Degree preferred
